section.title: Поширені запитання
section.description: Тут будуть зібрані всі питання, які ви нам задавали і задаєте щодня

list.question: 1 Питання
list.answer: They already bought 2 apartments from Comfort, in different complexes, under different conditions: 100% payment and rescheduling. We live in one of the apartments, we are waiting for the handover of the second one. The company is 100% satisfied with the provision of services.

list.question: 2 Питання
